channel.title: CVE Feed for XEROX -- AltaLink B8045/B8055/B8065/B8075/B8090
channel.description: The latest CVEs for XEROX -- AltaLink B8045/B8055/B8065/B8075/B8090

item.title: CVE-2019-10880|2024-08-04T22:32:02.151Z -- xerox -- altalink%20b8045%2Fb8055%2Fb8065%2Fb8075%2Fb8090
item.description: Within multiple XEROX products a vulnerability allows remote command execution on the Linux system, as the "nobody" user through a crafted "HTTP" request (OS Command Injection vulnerability in the HTTP interface). Depending upon configuration authentication may not be necessary.

item.title: CVE-2019-10881|2024-08-04T22:32:02.132Z -- xerox -- altalink%20b8045%2Fb8055%2Fb8065%2Fb8075%2Fb8090
item.description: Xerox AltaLink B8045/B8055/B8065/B8075/B8090, AltaLink C8030/C8035/C8045/C8055/C8070 with software releases before 103.xxx.030.32000 includes two accounts with weak hard-coded passwords which can be exploited and allow unauthorized access which cannot be disabled.
